interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: CONTROL CORRECTIVE Clear Med 5% Acne Treatment Lotion. 2.5 Oz - Kills Acne Bacteria, Helps Clear & Control Breakouts, Benzoyl Peroxide, 3% Sulfur To Improve Efficacy And Dry Up Blemishes, Penetrates
Review Date: 2021/07/17
Store: CONTROL CORRECTIVE SKIN CARE SYSTEMS
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1.8 x 3.6 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '815651010441', 'UPC': '815651010441', 'Manufacturer': 'Mainspring America, Inc. DBA Direct Cosmetics', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
Review Text: This works well for my chin acne. It was getting to the point of every time one pimple would heal two more were popping up! I had tried other acne lotion/treatments and I was still getting consistent break outs. This lotion has helped keep my skin under control. Works well, doesn't cause my skin to get too flaky and peel. I recommend this.
Review Title: Great for cystic acne
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin Wonder4 {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'} This does exactly what it's supposed to do! Easy to use, my feet are super soft afterwards. Charges quickly. Great choice! Works Wonderfully! Easydew 2-Step Face Contour Sheet Mask - Tightening & Anti-Aging & Hydrating Korean Face Mask with DW-EGF, Hyaluronic Acid for Anti-Winkle, Reducing Fine Line & Producing Collagen (Qty 5) EASYDEW {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Honey', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'Yes', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 6.38 x 0.63 inches; 7.44 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'EETS1003', 'Manufacturer': 'CleveAid'} I am obsessed with face masks! These arrived quickly and were well packaged. They have no scent, which is a good thing. Each mask has 2 steps... 1st step is four contour pads for under eye and frown lines and 2nd step is a full sheet mask. It feels amazing on my face! It doesn't shift around at all. I leave it on for 30 minutes and then apply my nighttime moisturizer.

Relaxing to wear
My skin really felt more firm after I used it
Closed my pores

Overall, I really liked this mask. I have tried probably 100 different face masks in my life and this is definitely in my TOP 5. STOP and BUY THIS! GO! Leuxe Facial Cleansing Brush, IPX6 Waterproof Rotating Face Brush for Deep Cleansing, 3 Modes and Smart Timer leuxe {'Brand': 'leuxe', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Pores,Cleansing', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Operation Mode': 'Automatic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 4 x 2.7 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '631517347748', 'Manufacturer': 'leuxe'} When I first began using this I definitely broke out a little more on my chin. I feel like it's because it really got deep down into my pores and brought all the breakouts to the surface. I was able to heal them at once and now my skin has maintained a clear appearance! So get past the beginning phase and you're good to go! I can see and feel the difference. Dr. Denese SkinScience Essential Lipid Anti Aging Power Infusion Dry Oil - Skin Nutrients 97% Organic 100% Natural - Rejuvinating Blend with Amaranth & Resveratrol - Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free - 2oz Dr. Denese {'Brand': 'Dr. Denese', 'Item Form': 'Dr. Denese', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.57 x 3.15 x 3.07 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '800166A', 'UPC': '811684022284', 'Manufacturer': 'Dr. Denese'} I wanted to use this for a while before I wrote a review and I absolutely love this stuff! It goes on easily and absorbs well. I feel like my skin looks smoother. I defintely recommend it! LOVE LOVE LOVE! Bioken] Cera Silkway Salon Quality Hair Serum - Enriched Premium Argan Oil (1.7 fl oz) Bioken {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Argan Oil', 'Liquid Volume': '1.7 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Bioken', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 1.81 x 1.77 inches; 4.96 Ounces', 'UPC': '856312005529'} You know when you get your hair done and you leave the salon with your hair smelling amazing the rest of the day...that's what this serum is like! It smells so good. I use it when my hair is wet or when I am just refreshing it mid day. Love it! SMELLS AMAZING! Karuna Oh, Glow On Face Mask Sheet, Skincare and Beauty Facial Masks with Moisturizing and Collagen Promotion Properties for Healthy Glow, Contain Green Tea, Vitamin C and Pineapple (3 Sheets) Karuna {'Brand': 'Karuna', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrate Skin,Hydrate', 'Scent': 'Pineapple', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 4.88 x 0.87 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MSF1004 - CA', 'UPC': '857950007166'} I don't normally like to use sheet masks, but I really like these. My face felt so soft and moisturized adter using them. I would buy these again I liked them so much. Love these sheet masks Kneipp Shower Foam Goodbye Stress Water Mint & Rosemary 6.81 Oz Kneipp {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Kneipp', 'Scent': 'Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 2.5 x 2.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} I love this stuff! It smells really refreshing. I'm into essential oils and it smells just like that...strong but invigorating. It comes out just like shaving cream foam. Scent lasts after you leave the bath/shower. 10/10 recommend Smells SO good! Zeitun Natural Anti Cellulite Body Scrub - Organic Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliator With Robusta & Dead Sea Salt - Cinnamon, Ginger And Moisturizing Oils, 7 oz Zeitun {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.91 x 8.27 inches; 7 Ounces'} This scrub is fantastic! Love the way it makes my skin feel after using it. Definitely recommend! Love! Caudalie Beauty Essentials Beauty Elixir Set: 3 Piece Radiance Trio including a Pore Tightening Facial Mist, Daily Foam Cleanser, Brightening Glycolic Peel Mask {'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.83 x 1.61 inches; 1.18 Pounds'} Awesome set! Perfect to give as a gift. Wonderful products. This is a well respected brand in skincare. 10/10 Amazing! Ice Roller for Face & Eye by Charmlily, Puffiness, Migraine, Pain Relief - Cold Facial Massager Treatment to Reduce Puffy Face & Tighten Pores, Under Eye Wrinkles (Blue) CHARMLILY {'Brand': 'CHARMLILY', 'Special Feature': 'Heat', 'Is Cordless?': 'Yes', 'Product Grade': 'Home', 'Style': 'Rustic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.91 x 3.54 x 2.44 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '679360114261', 'Manufacturer': 'CHARMLILY'} This is such a simple design but it really does help to "wake" your face up. It helps me feel more alive! I use it after I wash and dry my face before my moisturizer and serums.
100/100 go buy one! You NEED one. 1513 by LA LA LEAF - All Natural Facial Cream, 750mg Quick Absorbing Hemp Moisturizer with Rosehip, Carrot Seed and Provitamin B5 - Smooths Wrinkles for Firm Glowing Skin - Paraben-free, Cruelty-free, Vegan LA LA LEAF {'Brand': 'LA LA LEAF', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 3.2 x 2 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} Great moisturizer, absorbs really well ,no left over sticky residue. No Complaints! Busy Co. Biodegradable Hydrating Hand Wipes, With Collagen and Peptides to Smooth and Improve Elasticity, 15 Individually Wrapped Wipes (Refresh Line - Fresh Citrus) BUSYCO {'Brand': 'BUSYCO', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4.5 x 7.3 x 3.5 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} I keep these in my car and my bag for on the go! They clean well and I love that they're a more natural wipe. 10/10 will definitely buy more of these! Awesome Karuna 7 Days of Glow - Face & Eye Mask Variety Pack (7 Sheets), Hydrate, Brighten and Glow Karuna {'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 5.04 x 1.57 inches; 8.75 Ounces', 'UPC': '857950007333'} These masks make my skin so soft and hydrated! I really like the idea of a variety pack. I am defintely purchasing again. Love them! DBA Direct Cosmetics', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} This works well for my chin acne. It was getting to the point of every time one pimple would heal two more were popping up! I had tried other acne lotion/treatments and I was still getting consistent break outs. This lotion has helped keep my skin under control. Works well, doesn't cause my skin to get too flaky and peel. I recommend this. Great for cystic acne
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user continues to demonstrate a strong commitment to personal care, with a growing focus on targeted skincare solutions that address specific concerns, such as acne management while maintaining skin health.

- **Product Type Preference:** Their latest interaction highlights an interest in effective treatment formulations that target specific skin issues, indicating a nuanced approach that balances treatment with overall skin wellness.

- **Functionality Focus:** The user values products that effectively manage breakouts without compromising the integrity of their skin. Their preference for non-flaking and non-peeling treatments illustrates a desire for products that provide visible results without adverse effects.

- **Convenience & Efficiency:** Ease of application remains critical, aligning with their active lifestyle and need for effective solutions that integrate seamlessly into their routine.

- **Positive Experience:** Their favorable review of an acne treatment reflects satisfaction with products that deliver substantial results, reinforcing their trend toward high-performance skincare solutions.

- **Aesthetic Appeal & Eco-Consciousness:** While aesthetic appeal continues to be important, their engagement with targeted treatments suggests a priority on functionality that meets their skincare needs.

This updated profile illustrates the user's evolving preferences towards effective and targeted skincare solutions that address specific issues while aligning with their values of health and efficiency. Their commitment to achieving clear, healthy skin remains steadfast.
